attributes.action: direct the Chancellor to either cut or freeze the pay of Members of Parliament, before any Treasury action to other public sector pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The best leaders will not ask those that they lead to do something they are not prepared to do themselves! Therefore the first cut or freeze of Public Sector pay should be that of Member's of Parliament. By taking such action the Government could demonstrate that it has the interests of the people of Great Britain in mind.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
